name: Judgement (itch) (tinytim12)
description:
An immersive sim set in the Cambodian jungle during the fall of the infamous Khmer Rouge regime. Gather supplies around the forest which can either save or kill the enemy soldier lying before you.


Game Design/Art Programming/Writing - Bernkastel#6693
Gameplay Programming - AO#5306
Soldier 3D Model - Clave#1974

All other 3D Assets are royalty-free sourced on the internet.
